title: Add GTK views for Xamarin.Forms
body:
**Description of Change**

Add some things to make GTK support better.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #379 (GTK# views for Forms)
- Fixes #555 (Helper methods)

**API Changes**

Added:

 - `GTKExtensions` for conversions (#555)
 - `SKCanvasViewRenderer` (need to investigate the scaling on this one)
 - NOT `SKGLViewRenderer` (there is code but it is excluded as it seems to be falling over)

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
